name: Motorbike Police Chase: Real Hot Pursuit Rider
name_original: Motorbike Police Chase: Real Hot Pursuit Rider
description:
Start your engines and get ready to ride your super bikes in non stop action pack police highway chase. You are the most wanted biker and highway police on the hunt for you on the super fast hot pursuit speed chase. Motorbike Police Chase: Real Hot Pursuit Rider is an extreme motorbike police pursuit racing game experience, you are supposed to test your motor bike and driving skills to beyond limits, perform dangerous stunts, escape the cops, pass through heavy traffic and be a most wanted biker. With Motorbike Police Chase: Real Hot Pursuit Rider never get caught by the eyes of anyone because you are the top high speed biker and police is on the loose to catch the high speed bikers. You might have played other racing, drifting games, with multi-player and police motorcycle chase stunt action game play, but this one is one of its kinds and it is highly unique, addictive game with easy and in hand one touch intuitive controls.
Motorbike Police Chase: Real Hot Pursuit Rider is a testing game for you to test drive your biker escape skill in this police chase simulation game, and see if you can do this action of thrill in real life or not. Pop the car of police evade the police helicopters with your fast speed motorbike, flying through the road busy in traffic and heavy trucks, you have to move fast and race like an eagle does in the air!!!

Game Features:
• High Speed Police Chase
• Police chasing with shooting
• 3D simulation bike driving experience
• Realistic sound effects
• Extreme racing and drifting game
• Easy, addictive and intuitive GUI
• City and highway environment
• Upgrade with scoring more points
• Multiple addictive levels
